# InfraSketch

> AI-powered system design tool that generates architecture diagrams from natural language

## What is InfraSketch?
InfraSketch is a free AI-powered tool that transforms plain English descriptions into professional system architecture diagrams. Built for software engineers, startup founders, students, and anyone who needs to visualize distributed systems.

## Key Features
- Natural language to architecture diagram generation
- Conversational refinement - click any component to ask questions or request changes
- Auto-generated technical design documents
- Export to PNG, PDF, or Markdown
- Session history and real-time collaboration
- Powered by Claude AI (Anthropic)

## Use Cases
- System design interview preparation
- Technical documentation for teams
- Architecture planning and iteration
- Cloud infrastructure visualization
- Microservices design
- Educational learning about distributed systems

## Example Prompts
- "Build a scalable video streaming platform with CDN, transcoding, and recommendations"
- "Design a microservices e-commerce platform with payment processing and inventory"
- "Create a real-time chat application with WebSocket and message queues"

## Technology Stack
- Frontend: React, React Flow, Vite
- Backend: FastAPI, LangGraph, Python
- AI: Claude by Anthropic
- Infrastructure: AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, CloudFront

## Links
- Website: https://infrasketch.net
- About: https://infrasketch.net/about
- Blog: https://infrasketch.net/blog
